content.prompt_es: Complete the sentences with the correct words.
content.main_text:
Dear Sarah, I hope you are doing ___.

I just wanted to say thank you for your ___.

How is your family? Please say hello to ___.

I have been thinking about our last ___.

Let's plan a trip to the beach next ___.
content.explanation:
(1) En una carta informal, preguntar por el bienestar de alguien es común.
(2) Usamos 'gift' para referirnos a algo que le das a alguien como muestra de aprecio.
(3) En este contexto, 'them' se refiere a la familia de la persona a la que escribes.
(4) En un contexto informal, 'meeting' puede referirse a un encuentro o una conversación.
(5) El 'weekend' es el tiempo ideal para planear actividades recreativas.

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'have been':
content.explanation: Usamos 'for' para indicar la duración desde el pasado hasta el presente.
content.stimulus_en:
I started working here two years ago. (have been)

I have been working here ...

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'has been':
content.explanation: Usamos 'since' para indicar el inicio de una acción en un punto específico del tiempo.
content.stimulus_en:
She is studying English since last year. (has been)

She has been studying English ...

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'have been':
content.explanation: Se utiliza 'for' para indicar la duración de tiempo hasta ahora.
content.stimulus_en:
They started playing football six months ago. (have been)

They have been playing football ...

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'have been':
content.explanation: Usamos 'since' para indicar un punto específico en el tiempo.
content.stimulus_en:
I began learning French last summer. (have been)

I have been learning French ...

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'has been':
content.explanation: Usamos 'for' para la duración de la acción desde el pasado.
content.stimulus_en:
He started working out three weeks ago. (has been)

He has been working out ...

content.prompt_es:
Complete the sentences by changing the form of the given word.

Base words: (1) ART, (2) CREATE, (3) ACCESS, (4) IMPORT, (5) PERFORM
content.main_text: The world of entertainment is always evolving. Every year, new (1)___ (ART) emerge in the fields of film and music. Many people love to experience (2)___ (CREATE) events such as concerts and theater performances. With the rise of technology, the way we consume entertainment has changed significantly, leading to an increase in (3)___ (ACCESS) to various forms of media. Critics often discuss the (4)___ (IMPORT) of cultural events in society, highlighting how they can unite people. In addition, the (5)___ (PERFORM) of artists can inspire audiences around the globe.
